hero.sub: Walk through 700 acres of living history. A fort that witnessed the rise and fall of empires, built in stone, and kept alive through legend.
feat.title: Reimagining Your Visit
feat.desc: Modern tools layered over ancient grandeur — navigate the fort like never before.
feat.c1.title: Smart Navigation
feat.c1.desc: GPS-enabled digital maps for Vijay Stambh, Padmini Palace, and over 65 heritage monuments within the fort complex.
feat.c2.title: Curated Itineraries
feat.c2.desc: Personalized day plans tailored to your interests — history, architecture, spirituality, or local crafts and cuisine.
feat.c3.title: Cultural Immersion
feat.c3.desc: Live craft demonstrations, heritage walks, and direct connections with community artisans keeping traditions alive.
quote.text: Chittorgarh is not just a fort — it is a testimony to the undying spirit of Rajputana, where every stone whispers a tale of honour.
art.title: The Soul of Chittorgarh
art.desc: Centuries-old crafts, passed down through generations. Shop directly from the masters.
art.c1.title: Bassi Wood Art & Puppets
art.c1.desc: Intricate wooden toys and kawad art from the masters of Bassi village — a tradition over 500 years old.
art.c2.title: Akola Prints
art.c2.desc: Vibrant natural-dye hand-block prints using the ancient mud-resist technique unique to this region.
art.c3.title: Thewa Jewelry
art.c3.desc: Exquisite gold filigree fused on glass — a royal craft born in Pratapgarh, exclusive to this region.
cta.title: Ready to Witness
cta.desc: Start planning your Chittorgarh itinerary today — we'll handle the details.
footer.desc: Experience the timeless glory of Rajasthan's greatest fort complex — a journey through bravery, sacrifice, and architectural marvels spanning 700 acres of living history.

hotel.h1.desc: A boutique heritage stay with a 4.1/5 rating. Known for its royal ambience, complimentary Hi-Tea, and immersive cultural experience.
hotel.h2.name: Shree Anandam Resort
hotel.h2.desc: A premium 4-star resort featuring a swimming pool, spacious luxury rooms, and exceptional hospitality. Rated 3.5/5.
hotel.h3.name: Hotel Pride Of Chittor
hotel.h3.desc: Top-rated (4.2/5) modern luxury hotel offering world-class amenities, exceptional service, and close proximity to the city center.

hotel.h4.desc: A popular choice for travelers with a 3.9/5 rating. Offers a blend of modern comfort and traditional Rajasthani warmth.
